narrative.narrative: Kish Air is an Iranian airline based at Tehran's Mehrabad Airport and at Kish, an Iranian island in the Persian Gulf that is a tourist destination, for which the airline takes its name. It was founded in 1989. They serve 19 domestic airports, and 7 others around the Middle East including Turkey and 2 in the UAE.They have 12 planes, 5 MD-82's, 4 MD-83's, and 3 Fokker 100's.
